Type Method# buildBlock(_:_:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
static func buildBlock<R0, R1>(
    _ r0: R0,
    _ r1: R1
) -> some ResolverSpecification where R0 : Resolver, R1 : Resolver

```

Available when `Property` conforms to `_IntentValue`.## [See Also](/documentation/AppIntents/ResolverSpecificationBuilder/buildBlock(_:_:)#see-also)
